name: MOON VR Video Player
abstract: Enjoy Any Video in VR with Absolute Ease! Broadest format support, stable performance and ease of use. All thanks to over 100,000 hours spent on development since 2015.

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
Version: 2.7.1

Updated:

Refactored the top toolbar UI, modified the interaction color and added dynamic effects.

Added handle vibration.

Added UI hints for new operations.

Added demo animation for keyboard operation.

Added sorting function, which can sort videos by name/modified time/duration etc. (Please understand that some page may not be able to get the data due to the difference of some data sources, which may affect the sorting order).

Adjust the handle operation mode, two handles can be displayed at the same time; cancel A/X as the confirmation key, press A/X in the playback interface to perform quick play and pause operations.

Fix the problem of Full SBS video displaying incorrectly in left and right stereo modes resulting in ghosting.

Fix the problem of application opening in the main page that causes lagging or crashing.

Fix the problem that the refresh may result returns to the root directory.

Repair the problem of incorrect video numbers when refreshing videos fr
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
